description:
Try your luck with Astraware Casino - a collection of the most popular casino games all in 1 pack. Enjoy all the fun of a real casino on your smartphone without losing your shirt! Astraware Casino features 11 of the most popular games found in casinos around the world including Texas Hold 'Em No Limit Poker, Roulette, Slots, and Blackjack. You'll also get $1000 in your virtual wallet so you can start playing right away.
Also includes instructions on how to play each of the games, designed with casual players in mind. As you progress and play more, higher stake tables and games are unlocked, offering bigger bets and larger wins. Astraware Casino also includes a bank where you can get an overdraft if your luck is out, or stash your cash when you win big.

Supports the webOS backswipe gesture to get in and out of each game. New users - swipe from right to left in the area just below the display!
